    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,

        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',

        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,

        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

                  </table></td>

                <tr><td align="center" height="22"><a href="#" onClick="autoShowDate();">关闭</a></td></tr>
              </table>
            </form>
          </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {

        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',

        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

                            var gNum;
                            for(i=0;i<6;i++)

                                }

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,

        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {

        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,

        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    .tiaozhuan a{
        display: inline-block;
        color: #fff;
        background: #d00;
        border-radius: 10px;
        padding:20px 15px;
        font-size:1.5rem;
    }
    @media (min-device-width: 320px) and (max-width: 689px), (max-device-width: 480px) {
    body{
        overflow: auto;
    }
  }
</style>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>
    <script language=JavaScript>
        document.write("<div id=detail style=position:absolute;width:300px;></div>");

    <SCRIPT language=Javascript src="../../../tplimg/disname2.js"></SCRIPT>
    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>
    <script language=JavaScript>
        document.write("<div id=detail style=position:absolute;width:300px;></div>");

    <SCRIPT language=Javascript src="../../../tplimg/disname2.js"></SCRIPT>
    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

        <a id="tiaozhuanurl" href="http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrbwap/paperindex.htm">手机版</a>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

        document.write("<div id=detail style=position:absolute;width:300px;></div>");

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,

        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>
    <SCRIPT language=Javascript src="../../../tplimg/webdig_test.js"></SCRIPT>

</body>

</html>

        <a id="tiaozhuanurl" href="http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrbwap/paperindex.htm">手机版</a>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>
    <script language=JavaScript>
        document.write("<div id=detail style=position:absolute;width:300px;></div>");
    </script>
    <SCRIPT language=Javascript src="../../../tplimg/disname2.js"></SCRIPT>
    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {

        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',

        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,

        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

                  </table></td>

                <tr><td align="center" height="22"><a href="#" onClick="autoShowDate();">关闭</a></td></tr>
              </table>
            </form>
          </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,

        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',

        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,

        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

                        <script type="text/JavaScript">
                            var gNum;
                            for(i=0;i<6;i++)
                            {
                                document.write('<tr align=center>');
                                for(j=0;j<7;j++)
                                {
                                    gNum = i*7+j;

                                }

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {

        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',

        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,

        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

                        <script type="text/JavaScript">
                            var gNum;
                            for(i=0;i<6;i++)
                            {
                                document.write('<tr align=center>');
                                for(j=0;j<7;j++)
                                {
                                    gNum = i*7+j;

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){

        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {

        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

                        <script type="text/JavaScript">
                            var gNum;
                            for(i=0;i<6;i++)
                            {
                                document.write('<tr align=center>');
                                for(j=0;j<7;j++)
                                {
                                    gNum = i*7+j;
                                    document.write('<td  bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="default" align=center id="GD' + gNum +'" style="cursor: default;" width="14%"><a href="" id="CD' + gNum + '"><span class="date" style="font-family:Verdana, Arial;font-size:11px;"><font _onMouseOver="mOvr(' + gNum +')" onMouseOut="mOut()" id="SD' + gNum +'"');
                                    document.write('></font></span></a><br><font id="LD' + gNum + '" size=2 class=pt9 style=display:none></font></td>');
                                }
                                document.write('</tr>');
                            }
                  </script>
                      </table></td>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {

        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,

        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

        <div id=daydh style="display:none; position:absolute; left:140px;top:30px;z-index:1000; filter:alpha(opacity=90);"  onmouseover="document.getElementById('daydh').style.display='block';" >

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {

        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {

        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
        //   })
        // }

        
        ;(function(){
          var _global;
          let duration = 500;//时间参数
          var plugin = {
              tipNav:function(tipmain,tipsub){
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseover',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'block'
                },false);
                tipmain.addEventListener('mouseout',function(){
                    tipsub.style.display = 'none'
                },false);
              },
              replayTop:function(tipmain){
                    tipmain.addEventListener('click',function(){
                        let topSzie = document.documentElement.scrollTop;
                        let s = topSzie / 600 * 25;  //路程/时间=s *25每隔25ms秒 动的路程
                        let st = setInterval(function () {
                            topSzie -= s;
                            if (topSzie <= 0) {
                                topSzie = 0; //当l<=0时，设置l=0
                                clearInterval(st);
                            }
                            document.documentElement.scrollTop = topSzie;
                        }, 25)
                    },false);

              }
          }
          //赋值全局
          _global = (function(){ return this || (0, eval)('this'); }());
         !('plugin' in _global) && (_global.plugin = plugin);

        })(window)


            var ribaoButton = document.getElementById('ribao');
            var ribaoBox = document.getElementById('ribaobox');
            var zhoubaoButton = document.getElementById('zhoubao');
            var zhoubaoBox = document.getElementById('zhoubaobox');
            var zazhiButton = document.getElementById('zazhi');
            var zaizhiBox = document.getElementById('zazhibox');
            var goTop = document.getElementById('go-top');

            plugin.tipNav(ribaoButton,ribaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zhoubaoButton,zhoubaoBox);
            plugin.tipNav(zazhiButton,zaizhiBox);
            //plugin.replayTop(goTop);
        
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var cw1 = window.innerWidth;
        var sUserAgent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();    
        var bIsIpad = sUserAgent.match(/ipad/i) == "ipad";    
        var bIsIphoneOs = sUserAgent.match(/iphone os/i) == "iphone os";    
        var bIsMidp = sUserAgent.match(/midp/i) == "midp";    
        var bIsUc7 = sUserAgent.match(/rv:1.2.3.4/i) == "rv:1.2.3.4";    
        var bIsUc = sUserAgent.match(/ucweb/i) == "ucweb";    
        var bIsAndroid = sUserAgent.match(/android/i) == "android";    
        var bIsCE = sUserAgent.match(/windows ce/i) == "windows ce";    
        var bIsWM = sUserAgent.match(/windows mobile/i) == "windows mobile";    
        if (bIsIphoneOs || bIsMidp || bIsUc7 || bIsUc || bIsAndroid || bIsCE || bIsWM ){
            var tiaozhuanBox =  document.getElementById('tiaozhuan');
            var tiaozhuanurl = document.getElementById('tiaozhuanurl');
            tiaozhuanBox.style.display = 'block';
            var url = window.location.href;
            var newsurl = url.split('rmrb');
            tiaozhuanurl.setAttribute('href',newsurl[0]+'rmrbwap'+newsurl[1]);
        }  
                    
</script>

    <script>
        // var swiperBox = document.getElementById('swiperBox').getElementsByTagName('div');
        // var url = window.location.href;
        
        // if(swiperBox.length <= 4){
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:swiperBox.length,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
        //         nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
        //         prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
        //     },
            
        //   })
        // }else{
        //     var mySwiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
        //     slidesPerView:4,
        //     slidesPerColumnFill : 'row',
        //     spaceBetween : 3,
        //     navigation: {
